description:
Clean My Space
1.76M subscribers

I've had a love-hate relationship with vinegar over the years. On one hand, I love all the DIY cleaning ideas and DIY cleaning recipes that vinegar can be used in, but on the other hand, I don't love the way it smells. Truthfully, I'm over the smell thing because vinegar just has so many DIY cleaning hacks and general cleaning uses, that the pros far outweigh the cons. In this video, I share with you 5 of my favorite uses for vinegar when it comes to cleaning and other chores around the house.

title: 34 OUTSTANDING GRANDMA'S CLEANING TIPS
description:
5-Minute Crafts
73.3M subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
CLEANING IDEAS YOU SHOULD KNOW FROM THE CHILDHOOD

I hate to spend a lot of time cleaning and I always search for different life hacks that will ease my life. It’s better to spend a day with friends instead of the whole day of cleaning your home. That’s why you need to know lever cleaning life hacks that will speed up your cleaning routine and will help to solve different small problems. Watch this video and enjoy a new collection of cleaning tips. 
The first collection of ideas will show you surprising ways to use kitchen sponges. I bet you haven’t known how multifunctional this simple item could be. It’s so annoying and boring to clean blinds from dust. Do the next -  take a pair of tongs, 2 kitchen sponges and paper cutter. Make slits on one side of sponges to put them on tongs. Put a sponge on each end of tongs. We will show you an easy way to clean tall glasses. Use kitchen sponges to remove nail polish. Take a glass jar, place a kitchen sponge and fill with nail polish remover liquid. 
We know how to easily clean your window mosquito nets. Mix dishwashing liquid and baking soda and spray this mixture on nets. Check out the tutorial! If your white sneakers look old and dirty, we know what to do! Mix toothpaste with dishwashing liquid and baking soda to clean your dirty sneakers. They will look brand new again! Microwave tangerine peels for 3 minutes. Remove peels and clean a microwave using a kitchen sponge. Tangerine essential oils perfectly clean the dirt.
TIMESTAMPS:
00:09 Kitchen sponge life hacks
00:48 DIY Dishwashing gloves
01:52 Nail polish remover idea
04:31 How to clean makeup sponge
07:07 How to clean a microwave

title: 26 USEFUL CLEANING HACKS AND TIPS
description:
5-Minute Crafts
73.3M subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
GENIUS CLEANING IDEAS TO MAKE YOUR HOME SPARKLE

A clean home is something that everyone wants, but most of the time, it takes a lot of work. In this video, I’m sharing with you some amazing tips and tricks to make your house sparkle. 
If you don’t have a bathroom cleaning product, you can use some bleach instead. Simply place it around your bathtub and scrape off all the buildup.
If you’re going somewhere and you want to take your hair straightener with you, take an oven mitt and place it inside to prevent it from burning anything in your backpack.  
Pour coffee beans in a glass container to organize your makeup brushes. 
Another great bathroom hack is to use a cutlery organizer to keep your toothbrushes, creams, and cotton pads organized and clean. 
Use straws to remove the dirt from all the places your vacuum doesn’t fit.   
Watch until the end to discover some amazing cleaning hacks for both your bathroom and your kitchen.

0:16 – Genius bathroom hacks

title: 25 NOT-SO-OBVIOUS CLEANING TIPS TO START DOING ASAP
description:
5-Minute Crafts
73.3M subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
You simply need to know these not-so-obvious cleaning tips to start doing ASAP! 

Check out highly effective quick tips on how to remove any kind of stains on any syrface: remove ketchup stains from your clothes with vinegar or spilled nail polish from the floor using plain sugar and that's only the beginning! 

I'll also show you how to do the laundry properly: separate laundry by color, don't use too much washing powder, to prevent the down from clumping add a couple of tennis balls, keep zippers zipped and buttons unbuttoned, put socks and bras in mesh washing bags, hand wash swimsuits, don't overload the washer! 

Follow these rules and make the laundry days much more fun! :)
